END da_instld_prod_invlvmt_role;

body.name: DA_INSTLD_PROD_INVLVMT_ROLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_INSTLD_PROD_INVLVMT_ROLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.56.684519000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id IN VARCHAR2
,instld_prod_invlvmt_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_instld_prod_invlvmt_role.add, parms=' || instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id || '|' || instld_prod_invlvmt_role_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_instld_prod_invlvmt_role a
(
a.instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id
,a.instld_prod_invlvmt_role_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id
,add.instld_prod_invlvmt_role_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_instld_prod_invlvmt_role.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_instld_prod_invlvmt_role.del, parms=' || instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_instld_prod_invlvmt_role a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id = del.instld_prod_invlvmt_role_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_instld_prod_invlvmt_role.del');

END del;

END da_instld_prod_invlvmt_role;
